data.text: Yamikani Yehova chifukwa ndi wabwino;
Owomboledwa a Yehova anene zimenezi
iwo amene anawasonkhanitsa kuchokera ku mayiko,
Ena anayendayenda mʼchipululu mopanda kanthu,
Iwo anamva njala ndi ludzu,
Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmavuto awo
Iye anawatsogolera mʼnjira yowongoka
Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha
pakuti Iye wapha ludzu la munthu womva ludzu
Ena anakhala mu mdima ndi mʼchisoni chachikulu,
pakuti iwowo anawukira mawu a Mulungu
Kotero Iye anawapereka kuti agwire ntchito yakalavulagaga;
Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmasautso awo
Yehova anawatulutsa mu mdima ndi mʼchisoni chachikulu
Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha
pakuti Iye amathyola zipata zamkuwa
Ena anakhala zitsiru chifukwa cha njira zawo zowukira,
Iwo ananyansidwa ndi chakudya chilichonse
Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmasautso awo
Iye anatumiza mawu ake ndi kuwachiritsa;
Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha
Apereke nsembe yachiyamiko
Ena anayenda pa nyanja mʼsitima zapamadzi;
Anaona ntchito za Yehova,
Pakuti Iye anayankhula ndi kuwutsa mphepo yamkuntho
Sitima za pamadzizo zinatukulidwa mmwamba ndi kutsikira pansi pakuya;
Anachita chizungulire ndi kudzandira ngati anthu oledzera;
Pamenepo analirira Yehova mʼmasautso awo
Yehova analetsa namondwe,
Anali osangalala pamene kunakhala bata,
Ayamike Yehova chifukwa cha chikondi chake chosatha
Akuze Iye mu msonkhano wa anthu
Iye anasandutsa mitsinje kukhala chipululu,
ndiponso nthaka yachonde kukhala nthaka yamchere,
Anasandutsa chipululu kukhala mayiwe a madzi
kumeneko Iye anabweretsa anthu anjala kuti azikhalako,
Anafesa mbewu mʼminda ndi kudzala mipesa
Yehova anawadalitsa, ndipo chiwerengero chawo chinachuluka kwambiri,
Kenaka chiwerengero chawo chinachepa ndipo iwo anatsitsidwa
Iye amene amakhuthulira mʼnyozo pa olemekezeka
Koma Iyeyo anakweza anthu osowa kuchoka ku masautso awo
Anthu olungama mtima amaona ndi kusangalala,
Aliyense wanzeru asamalitse zinthu zimenezi
